title: The Dark Lord's Summons (1U242)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Sauron
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Search. To play, spot a [Sauron] Orc. Plays to your support area. Shadow: Remove (3) to reveal the top card of your draw deck. If it is a [Sauron] card, take it into hand. Otherwise, discard it and one other card from hand.
Lore:	Orcs obey the Dark Lord unquestioningly.
Rarity:	U
